info.title: Financial Messaging APIs
info.description: This documentation contains the description of all the financial messaging APIs

post.summary: Translate a TARGET2 MX message to TARGET2 MT message
post.description: Accepts an TARGET2 MX message request in plain text and translates it to the equivalent TARGET2 MT.

example.description: cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element 'CreDtTm'. One of '{"urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08":MsgId}' is expected.

post.summary: Translate a TARGET2 MT message to TARGET2 MX message
post.description: Accepts a TARGET2 MT message request in plain text and translates it to the equivalent TARGET2 MX.

requestBody.description:
For sandbox, use the below invalid message: 
{1:F01PBAADEFFAC2X0000000000}{2:O2021109210323PBBBDEFFXXXX00000000002103231109N}{3:{121:e008b028-59c5-41e9-be4c-d45102fc201e}}{4:
:21:Inp008b028-E2EId
:13C:/RNCTIME/0915+0200
:32A:191007EUR61250,00
:52A:PBBBDEFFXXX
:58A:PBAADEFFAC2
-}

post.summary: Translate a CBPR+ message to SWIFT MT
post.description: Accepts an CBPR+ message request in plain text and translates it to the equivalent SWIFT MT.

text/plain.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<AppHdr xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.02">
    <Fr>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>AAAABEBBXXX</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </Fr>
    <To>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>CCCCUS33XXX</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </To>
    <BizMsgIdr>987</BizMsgIdr>
    <MsgDefIdr>pacs.009.001.08</MsgDefIdr>
    <BizSvc>swift.cbprplus.01</BizSvc>
    <CreDt>2021-06-02T11:05:42.864+03:00</CreDt>
    <Prty>NORM</Prty>
</AppHdr>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08">
    <FICdtTrf>
        <GrpHdr>
            <MsgId>987</MsgId>
            <CreDtTm>2021-06-02T11:05:42.887+03:00</CreDtTm>
            <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
            <SttlmInf>
                <SttlmMtd>INDA</SttlmMtd>
            </SttlmInf>
        </GrpHdr>
        <CdtTrfTxInf>
            <PmtId>
                <InstrId>987</InstrId>
                <EndToEndId>NOTPROVIDED</EndToEndId>
                <UETR>c8b66b47-2bd9-48fe-be90-93c2096f27d2</UETR>
            </PmtId>
            <IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="USD">10500.00</IntrBkSttlmAmt>
            <IntrBkSttlmDt>2009-05-27</IntrBkSttlmDt>
            <SttlmTmIndctn>
                <DbtDtTm>2009-05-27T12:49:00.000+02:00</DbtDtTm>
            </SttlmTmIndctn>
            <PrvsInstgAgt1>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>CHASUS33</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </PrvsInstgAgt1>
            <InstgAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>AAAABEBBXXX</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstgAgt>
            <InstdAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>CCCCUS33XXX</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstdAgt>
            <IntrmyAgt1>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICD</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </IntrmyAgt1>
            <Dbtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>BKAUATWW</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Dbtr>
            <CdtrAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICE</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </CdtrAgt>
            <Cdtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICF</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Cdtr>
        </CdtTrfTxInf>
    </FICdtTrf>
</Document>

example.description: cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element 'CreDtTm'. One of '{"urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08":MsgId}' is expected.

post.summary: Translate a SWIFT MT message to CBPR+
post.description: Accepts an MT message request in plain text and translates it to the equivalent CBPR+.

requestBody.description:
For sandbox, use the below invalid message: 
{1:F01AAAABEBBAXXX0000000000}{2:I202CCCCUS33AXXXN}{3:{121:c8b66b47-2bd9-48fe-be90-93c2096f27d2}}{4:
:21:090525/123COV
:13C:/SNDTIME/1249+0200
:32A:090527USD10500,00
:52A:BKAUATWW
:56A:TESTBICD
:57A:TESTBICE
:58A:TESTBICF
:72:/INS/CHASUS33
-}{5:{MAC:75D138E4}{CHK:DE1B0D71FA96}}

*/*.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<AppHdr xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.02">
    <Fr>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>AAAABEBBXXX</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </Fr>
    <To>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>CCCCUS33XXX</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </To>
    <BizMsgIdr>987</BizMsgIdr>
    <MsgDefIdr>pacs.009.001.08</MsgDefIdr>
    <BizSvc>swift.cbprplus.01</BizSvc>
    <CreDt>2021-06-02T15:19:05.507+03:00</CreDt>
    <Prty>NORM</Prty>
</AppHdr>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08">
    <FICdtTrf>
        <GrpHdr>
            <MsgId>987</MsgId>
            <CreDtTm>2021-06-02T15:19:05.548+03:00</CreDtTm>
            <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
            <SttlmInf>
                <SttlmMtd>INDA</SttlmMtd>
            </SttlmInf>
        </GrpHdr>
        <CdtTrfTxInf>
            <PmtId>
                <InstrId>987</InstrId>
                <EndToEndId>NOTPROVIDED</EndToEndId>
                <UETR>c8b66b47-2bd9-48fe-be90-93c2096f27d2</UETR>
            </PmtId>
            <IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="USD">10500.00</IntrBkSttlmAmt>
            <IntrBkSttlmDt>2009-05-27</IntrBkSttlmDt>
            <SttlmTmIndctn>
                <DbtDtTm>2009-05-27T12:49:00.000+02:00</DbtDtTm>
            </SttlmTmIndctn>
            <PrvsInstgAgt1>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>CHASUS33</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </PrvsInstgAgt1>
            <InstgAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>AAAABEBBXXX</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstgAgt>
            <InstdAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>CCCCUS33XXX</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstdAgt>
            <IntrmyAgt1>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICD</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </IntrmyAgt1>
            <Dbtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>BKAUATWW</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Dbtr>
            <CdtrAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICE</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </CdtrAgt>
            <Cdtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICF</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Cdtr>
        </CdtTrfTxInf>
    </FICdtTrf>
</Document>

example.description: SV16 - Mandatory Tag is missing

post.description: Accepts a TARGET2 message request in plain text and validates it.

text/plain.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--Inbound_pacs.009_RTGS_FICreditTransferOrder_COV_bs028-->
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08 RTGS_pacs_guidelines_pacs_009_FIToFIFinancialInstitutionCreditTransfer_pacs_009_001_08_20191021_1544%20(1).xsd">
    <FICdtTrf>
        <GrpHdr>
            <MsgId>NONREF</MsgId>
            <CreDtTm>2019-10-07T13:45:00+00:00</CreDtTm>
            <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
            <SttlmInf>
                <SttlmMtd>CLRG</SttlmMtd>
                <ClrSys>
                    <Cd>TGT</Cd>
                </ClrSys>
            </SttlmInf>
        </GrpHdr>
        <CdtTrfTxInf>
            <PmtId>
                <InstrId>Inp009b028-InsId</InstrId>
                <EndToEndId>Inp008b028-E2EId</EndToEndId>
                <UETR>e008b028-59c5-41e9-be4c-d45102fc201e</UETR>
            </PmtId>
            <IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="EUR">61250.00</IntrBkSttlmAmt>
            <IntrBkSttlmDt>2019-10-07</IntrBkSttlmDt>
            <InstgAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>PBBBDEFFXXX</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstgAgt>
            <InstdAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>PBAADEFFAC2</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstdAgt>
            <Dbtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>PBBBDEFFXXX</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Dbtr>
            <Cdtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>PBAADEFFAC2</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Cdtr>
            <UndrlygCstmrCdtTrf>
                <UltmtDbtr>
                    <Nm>Ultimate debtor name</Nm>
                    <Id>
                        <OrgId>
                            <AnyBIC>ULTMDBTRBIC</AnyBIC>
                        </OrgId>
                    </Id>
                </UltmtDbtr>
                <Dbtr>
                    <Nm>Debit customer name</Nm>
                    <PstlAdr>
                        <TwnNm>Frankfurt</TwnNm>
                        <Ctry>DE</Ctry>
                    </PstlAdr>
                </Dbtr>
                <DbtrAgt>
                    <FinInstnId>
                        <BICFI>PBBBDEFFXXX</BICFI>
                    </FinInstnId>
                </DbtrAgt>
                <CdtrAgt>
                    <FinInstnId>
                        <BICFI>PBAADEFFXXX</BICFI>
                    </FinInstnId>
                </CdtrAgt>
                <Cdtr>
                    <Nm>Credit customer name</Nm>
                    <PstlAdr>
                        <TwnNm>Dusseldorf</TwnNm>
                        <Ctry>DE</Ctry>
                    </PstlAdr>
                </Cdtr>
                <UltmtCdtr>
                    <Nm>Ultimate creditor name</Nm>
                    <Id>
                        <OrgId>
                            <AnyBIC>ULTMCDTRBIC</AnyBIC>
                        </OrgId>
                    </Id>
                </UltmtCdtr>
            </UndrlygCstmrCdtTrf>
        </CdtTrfTxInf>
    </FICdtTrf>
</Document>

example.description: cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element 'CreDtTm'. One of '{"urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08":MsgId}' is expected.

post.description: Accepts an MX message request in plain text and validates it.

example.description: cvc-maxLength-valid: Value 'Times Square More than allowed characters here. Maximum allowed length is 70 characters' with length = '87' is not facet-valid with respect to maxLength '70' for type 'Max70Text'.
cvc-type.3.1.3: The value 'Times Square More than allowed characters here. Maximum allowed length is 70 characters' of element 'StrtNm' is not valid.
cvc-pattern-valid: Value 'INVALIDBICCODE' is not facet-valid with respect to pattern '[A-Z0-9]{4,4}[A-Z]{2,2}[A-Z0-9]{2,2}([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}' for type 'BICFIDec2014Identifier'.
cvc-type.3.1.3: The value 'INVALIDBICCODE' of element 'BICFI' is not valid.
cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element 'OrgnlMsgNmId'. One of '{"urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.002.001.10":OrgnlMsgId}' is expected.
Invalid FI BIC.

post.description: Accepts an MT103 and creates an MT199 following universal confirmation rules

requestBody.description:
For sandbox, use the below invalid message: 
{1:F01COPZBEB0AXXX0377002845}{2:O1031519110804LRLRXXXX4A1100009044681108041720N}{3:{108:MT103 006 OF 045}{119:REMIT}{121:c8b66b47-2bd9-48fe-be90-93c2096f27d2}{433:/AOK/NOT CHECKED         }}{4:
:20:00043AAASSSDDDDFFGGHHHGGFFFDFDDDDDSSSSDD
:23B:SSTD
:32A:001118USD3,34
:50F:/34x
1/Name
2/AddressLine
3/US/Town
:57D:/C/Clementine Nuggets-1842-Y
4X35x
:59F:1/Beneficiary Name-1234567891234123
2/QWERT
3/US/Beneficiary Address Line 21
3/Beneficiary Name-1234567891234123
:71A:OUR
:77T:9000z
-}{5:{MAC:00000000}{CHK:7C4CBA518E33}{TNG:}}{S:{SAC:}{COP:P}}

cvc-pattern-valid: Value 'INVALIDBICCODE' is not facet-valid with respect to pattern '[A-Z0-9]{4,4}[A-Z]{2,2}[A-Z0-9]{2,2}([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}' for type 'BICFIDec2014Identifier'.
cvc-type.3.1.3: The value 'INVALIDBICCODE' of element 'BICFI' is not valid.

post.summary: Convert an MT Message to PDF
post.description: Accepts an MT message request in plain text and returns it wrapped in a pdf format.

requestBody.description:
For sandbox, use the below invalid message: 
{1:F01COPZBEB0AXXX0377002843}{2:O1011519110804LRLRXXXX4A1100009044661108041720N}{3:{108:MT101 006 OF 020}{433:/AOK/NO HIT DETECTED     }}{4:
:20:00043AAASSSDDDDFFGGHHHGGFFFDFDDDDDSSSSDD
:28D:1/1
:50F:/409074-293-45/786

2/High Street 1

post.description: Accepts a CBPR+ message request in plain text and validates it.

text/plain.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<AppHdr xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.02">
    <Fr>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>BBBBUS33</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </Fr>
    <To>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>CCCCJPJT</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </To>
    <BizMsgIdr>BBBB/120928-FICT/JPY/430</BizMsgIdr>
    <MsgDefIdr>pacs.009.001.08</MsgDefIdr>
    <BizSvc>swift.cbprplus.01</BizSvc>
    <MktPrctc>
        <Regy>string</Regy>
        <Id>string</Id>
    </MktPrctc>
    <CreDt>2008-09-29T04:49:45+03:00</CreDt>
    <CpyDplct>CODU</CpyDplct>
    <PssblDplct>true</PssblDplct>
    <Prty>NORM</Prty>
    <Rltd>
        <Fr>
            <FIId>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>BBBBUS33</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </FIId>
        </Fr>
        <To>
            <FIId>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>CCCCJPJT</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </FIId>
        </To>
        <BizMsgIdr>BBBB/120928-FICT/JPY/430</BizMsgIdr>
        <MsgDefIdr>pacs.009.001.08</MsgDefIdr>
        <BizSvc>swift.cbprplus.01</BizSvc>
        <CreDt>2014-06-09T18:15:04+03:00</CreDt>
        <CpyDplct>COPY</CpyDplct>
        <Prty>NORM</Prty>
    </Rltd>
</AppHdr>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.009.001.08">
    <FICdtTrf>
        <GrpHdr>
            <MsgId>BBBB/120928-FICT/JPY/430</MsgId>
            <CreDtTm>2012-09-28T16:00:00+13:00</CreDtTm>
            <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
            <SttlmInf>
                <SttlmMtd>INDA</SttlmMtd>
                <SttlmAcct>
                    <Id>
                        <Othr>
                            <Id>ACCOUNTID</Id>
                        </Othr>
                    </Id>
                </SttlmAcct>
            </SttlmInf>
        </GrpHdr>
        <CdtTrfTxInf>
            <PmtId>
                <InstrId>BBBB/120928-FICT</InstrId>
                <EndToEndId>ABC/4562/2012-09-08</EndToEndId>
                <TxId>BBBB/120928-CCT/123/1</TxId>
                <UETR>00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000</UETR>
            </PmtId>
            <PmtTpInf>
                <InstrPrty>NORM</InstrPrty>
            </PmtTpInf>
            <IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="JPY">10000000</IntrBkSttlmAmt>
            <IntrBkSttlmDt>2012-09-29</IntrBkSttlmDt>
            <SttlmTmIndctn>
                <CdtDtTm>2012-09-28T16:00:00+13:00</CdtDtTm>
            </SttlmTmIndctn>
            <SttlmTmReq>
                <CLSTm>12:12:12+13:00</CLSTm>
            </SttlmTmReq>
            <PrvsInstgAgt1>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>TESTBICD</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </PrvsInstgAgt1>
            <InstgAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>BBBBUS33</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstgAgt>
            <InstdAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>CCCCJPJT</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstdAgt>
            <IntrmyAgt1>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>INTERBIC</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </IntrmyAgt1>
            <IntrmyAgt1Acct>
                <Id>
                    <Othr>
                        <Id>INTERAGTACCT</Id>
                    </Othr>
                </Id>
            </IntrmyAgt1Acct>
            <Dbtr>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>BBBBUS33</BICFI>
                    <Nm>Debtor Name</Nm>
                    <PstlAdr>
                        <AdrLine>Address</AdrLine>
                    </PstlAdr>
                </FinInstnId>
            </Dbtr>
            <DbtrAcct>
                <Id>
                    <Othr>
                        <Id>DBTRACCT</Id>
                    </Othr>
                </Id>
            </DbtrAcct>
            <DbtrAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>BBBBUS33</BICFI>
                </FinInstnId>
            </DbtrAgt>
            <CdtrAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BICFI>AAAAJPJT</BICFI>

post.summary: Envelopes a CBPR+ Message inside a RequestPayload
post.description: Accepts a CBPR+ message request and envelopes it inside a RequestPayload to be used in FINplus service.

text/plain.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<AppHdr xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.02">
    <Fr>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>BBBBUS33</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </Fr>
    <To>
        <FIId>
            <FinInstnId>
                <BICFI>CCCCJPJT</BICFI>
            </FinInstnId>
        </FIId>
    </To>
    <BizMsgIdr>BBBB/120928-FICT/JPY/430</BizMsgIdr>
    <MsgDefIdr>pacs.009.001.08</MsgDefIdr>
    <BizSvc>swift.cbprplus.01</BizSvc>
    <MktPrctc>
        <Regy>string</Regy>
        <Id>string</Id>
    </MktPrctc>
    <CreDt>2008-09-29T04:49:45+03:00</CreDt>

</AppHdr>

post.description: Accepts a SEPA message request in plain text and validates it.

text/plain.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.002.001.03">
    <FIToFIPmtStsRpt>
        <GrpHdr>
            <MsgId>SCTREJ200020190314300000000001</MsgId>
            <CreDtTm>2019-03-14T00:00:00</CreDtTm>
            <InstdAgt>
                <FinInstnId>
                    <BIC>TESTBICA</BIC>
                </FinInstnId>
            </InstdAgt>
